author: Frank Herbert
synopsis: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune tells the story of a young man named Paul Atreides, whose family accepts the stewardship of the planet. As he unfolds his destiny, he learns to harness the power of the mysterious spice Melange.

bookTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
synopsis: A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits a simple ring, but it is no ordinary ring. It is the One Ring, an artifact of immense power created by the Dark Lord Sauron. Frodo and his loyal companions embark on a perilous quest to destroy the Ring in the fires of Mount Doom.

author: Agatha Christie
synopsis: A luxurious train journey is interrupted by a shocking murder. Detective Hercule Poirot is called upon to solve the perplexing case, with every passenger a potential suspect. As the train races through the snowy landscape, Poirot must unravel a web of secrets and lies.

author: Jane Austen
synopsis: Elizabeth Bennet, a spirited young woman, clashes with the proud Mr. Darcy. As their initial animosity grows, they begin to see each other in a new light, and a complex and passionate romance unfolds.

author: James Goldman
synopsis: Set in 1183, the play explores the tumultuous political landscape of 12th-century England. King Henry II, his queen Eleanor of Aquitaine, and their sons vie for power and love in a gripping tale of royal intrigue and family drama.

bookTitle: Love in the Time of Algorithms
author: Ava Avery
synopsis: In a world dominated by dating apps and artificial intelligence, a young woman falls in love with a man she meets online. But as their relationship deepens, they begin to question the authenticity of their connection and the role technology plays in love.

author: Ali Hazelwood
synopsis: A fake relationship between a grumpy scientist and a cheerful fake girlfriend turns into a real one, filled with scientific experiments, heartwarming moments, and a lot of laughter.

bookTitle: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
synopsis: A humorous and satirical science fiction comedy series following the adventures of Arthur Dent, who is unexpectedly swept up in a cosmic journey across the galaxy.

author: Gillian Flynn
synopsis: A psychological thriller about a missing wife and a husband under suspicion, exploring themes of marriage, deceit, and the dark side of human nature.

author: Agatha Christie
synopsis: Ten strangers are lured to a secluded island, and one by one, they are mysteriously murdered. A classic mystery novel filled with suspense and intrigue.

author: Alex Michaelides
synopsis: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a shocking act of violence, and a psychotherapist determined to uncover the truth behind her silence.

author: Walt Whitman
synopsis: A groundbreaking collection of poetry celebrating individuality, democracy, and the interconnectedness of all things.

bookTitle: The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock
author: T.S. Eliot
synopsis: A modernist masterpiece exploring themes of alienation, anxiety, and the passage of time.
